content.content: 1727×624 39.9 KB  Hi everyone, thanks for checking out the State of Dai. Now separate from the Weekly Relay with the objective to scale and improve all the information you need for your Dai escapades!  The public PDF version is available here.   Peg870×623 107 KB   Slight peg variance in the past 24 hours. So we can dive into that arb, for once.   1192×424 78.9 KB   On-chain slippage above peg hit $1.14 with a 2.94 million DAI trade on Sushiswap.   1257×482 102 KB   Sushi monster trade hit 7 hours ago; follow along with the MEV bot to see their execution in realtime.   Below peg1134×436 69 KB   And the corresponding trade volume below peg at Uniswap v2 pools.    A nice healthy arb for a 287 ETH profit. Someone has been reading state of DAI      All that detective work explains our lovely peg stats for the week—free markets for the win.   DAI Supply1364×745 80.9 KB   A slight reduction in Dai supply, including USDC down to 53% of generation.   Vault changes1210×868 144 KB   Reduction in # of ETH-A vaults and 52 million outflows from WBTC-A, but additions in ETH-C and staked ETH-A.    Staked ETH carved out a sliver of the debt share.   Hit the DC1089×497 31.3 KB   Debt ceiling is maxed, but there are threads about accelerating access to this ilk.   Borrow/repay754×604 48.6 KB   Net negative (burns) of 116 million this last week.  Visit Makerburn for an up-to-the-minute breakdown.   Risky debt is mostly on the medium bucket.   Liquidation breakdown per drop789×445 51.6 KB   Slight adjustment to the liquidation hill, a hypothetical drop of 27% instead of 29% hits 26 million in Debt.    By protection bucket and drop, collateralization is keeping capital at-risk low. It has to go beyond 30% to start hurting, at which point we would have larger problems.  daistats.com | makerburn.com | maker.blockanalitica.com   Have Feedback? We value your input! Take our survey to let us know what we might be missing or how to do better. Disclaimer: This update is assembled by a group of contributing members in the MakerDAO community. This does not serve as financial advice or an inducement to vote in any specific way. This update is for information and communication purposes only.  Credit @twblack88

ith a good strategy with the bot, then a psm will definitely convince me.
